name: Composer  - Blocks
description:
We have created the most flexible and robust Design System to enable you to easily deploy your brand color scheme, fonts, images, and styles into it. Simple, modular and accessible components that will surely power up your designs.

 

To enjoy this file  with your brand style, you can customize Composer Theme with your brand identity in Composer Design System - Theme and Components. Composer Blocks and Surfaces file is created for you to build in a faster and more efficient way. These patterns will be helpful in situations when you have the same block on a number of different pages and you only need to modify its content or its distribution while keeping the same aspect on all the pages.

 

Use this file in combination of the Composer Design System - Theme and Components, Composer Design System - Icons and Illustrations, and Composer Design System - Components Tokens. 

 

Learn more about Composer at: cmpsr.io and storybook.cmpsr.io
